name: MeatScape
description:
Live and die by the meat, in ... MEATSCAPE.

Genre: Action/Endless

See how many levels you can survive in the MeatScape. Watch out, attacking hurts you but you can regain health by collecting the meatclumps that engulf the flies.

Controls
Aim - Mouse
Throw - Left mouse
Move - WASD

Our first Ludum Dare entry.
